entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming north 30 km/h after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
